name: SNAKE (itch) (Jaelen Cole)
description:
Blocky the Snake is Hungry. Help him satisfy his appetite by chomping as much fruit as you can.

Use the  W, A, S, and D keys to move. If your playing this game on your phone you can use the control arrows and central button on display.

Each  fruit gives you 20 pts and also makes Blocky increase in length. The longer he gets, the harder it becomes to chomp more and more fruit.
